resources.string: Heart beat lan server for android
Pairing, this phone can be discovered by other client.
Not pairing, this phone cannot be discovered by new client.
the heartbeat lan app will continue runs in background...
the heartbeat lan app will stop.
1. please check the devices you want to use(pair it first).\n2. please configure your phone to keep this app live.\n3. please click the close app button to ensure no background task are running.
